text: Yuri Vasilyevich Mamonov (; 18 February 1958 â€“ 11 June 2022) was a Russian politician. He was a Deputy of the State Duma for its 3rd convocation, between 2000 and 2003. Moamonov was born in Moscow, Russia. He was a member of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia. Mamonov died on 11 June 2022 at his house in Moscow, aged 64. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Moscow Category:Members of the State Duma
title: Yuri Mamonov
